abstract: Reports on manufacturing and housing sent the S. & P. index past 1,000 for the first time since early November.
snippet: Reports on manufacturing and housing sent the S. & P. index past 1,000 for the first time since early November.
lead_paragraph: For thousands of investors whose portfolios are benchmarked to the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index, recovery was a thing with four digits on Monday.

headline.main: Markets Rise on Signs of Economic Growth
headline.print_headline: S.&.P. Rises Over 1,000 On Optimism for Growth
